node.html:
• Working as a TA for Online React Web Development Courses.
  • Allocated dedicated time slots to solve student doubts on Fullstack Web Development.
  • Mentoring students for enhancing their CS skills and monitoring the overall progress of my assigned students.

• Working as a Technical Content Writer.
  • Writing articles on DSA, CP, Mathematics, Web Technologies (React, Redux).
  • Profile Link: https://auth.geeksforgeeks.org/user/greenindia/articles.

• Worked as a Front-End Developer using the Angular Framework.
  • Part of a 2 member team of DataSutram that developed an online charting tool - DataViz - aimed at Data Scientists for exploratory Data Analysis.
  • Used D3.js, a Javascript library, extensively to create custom, interactive and dynamic charts.
  • Commits link: https://gitlab.datasutram.com/csv-visualization/xpand-chart/commits/staging
